title: Audi to hike vehicle prices by up to 2% from June
description: Audi plans to raise prices on its model range in India by up to 2% starting June 1, 2024, citing increased input and transportation costs. Balbir Singh Dhillon, Head of Audi India, stated that rising expenses necessitate the price hike, aiming for sustainable growth for the company and its dealers.
